attributes.action: stop the home office plans to introduce new powers for the police to stop and question individuals without reasonable cause.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is considering additional powers to stop and question citizens without any reasonable suspsicion of a crime.  Failure to answer questions could result in arrest and a charge of obstructing police, even if the person has committed no crime. This further erosion of our civil liberties is a step too far, and moves this country towards a police state and away from the very freedom that this ill judged and misguided move is presumably meant to protect.
